name: Unfolded dimensions by Team Tawdry
description: The game “Folding Dimensions” is a work of art  describing how an 1D creature travels to 3D world.  During the journey, he encountered with some hard puzzles, which requires shifting between dimensions. And when he finally reaches his destination, he found himself betrayed, and   recognized the fact that he was just delaying the inevitable, which refers to the pathetic ignorrance and naivete of an 1D creature.
